document_data.name: Disciples of the Yielding Way
document_data.aliases: Brothers and Sisters of the Open Palm
document_data.orgname: the Disciples of the Yielding Way
document_data.mainbody: The '''Disciples of the Yielding Way''', who were also called the '''Brothers and Sisters of the Open Palm''', were a monastic order devoted to [[Eldath]], the Goddess of Singing Waters.
document_data.Activities: The [[monk]]s of the order guarded sites sacred to Eldath and traveled to collect information on other isolated groves. Though they were quite capable of defending themselves, the monks never instigated violence.
